ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: The Radicons come walking out of the forest, bickering loudly as they aproached the Maximal base, sounding much like the Mean Street Posse whenever they argue.

The Radicons come walking out of the forest, bickering loudly as they aproa=
ched the Maximal base, sounding much like the Mean Street Posse whenever th=
ey argue.

"No, you guys are all idiots, Technical Wrestling is the most af=
fective!" Stranato said.

"Without power you have nothing!" Stronghold said=
, flexing.

"Submissions always work, those other moves can be reversed!" T=
rain Wreck said.

Arrow laughs crazily as they continue to argue. The Radic=
ons pause when they notice all of the parts everywhere. The Radicons look u=
p in surprise and see the bot that Plintissa told them about.

"Hey! Iron R=
aptor! Is that who you are?" Stranato said to Iron Raptor.

"Don't listen t=
o that idiot, we know who you are! We are the Radicons!" Airbomber said, st=
riking a pose.

All 6 Radicons strike elaborate poses.

"I was just being p=
olite, you junk heap!" Stranato whispered to Airbomber.

Arrow laughs giddi=
ly like a lunatic. Stronghold acts like a ham. Scamrock looks at all of the=
 parts laying around a screams in rage that he didn't get here sooner to he=
lp destroy this destroyed bot.

"Plintissa and Dracona must be here, may we=
 come in and attend their meeting?" Stranato asked, not knowing about them =
going to the war room.

Plintissa and Dracona are still sitting in the war =
room. They get bored and leave. Plintissa and Dracona walk outside the Maxi=
mal base for some fresh air. Plintissa gasps when she sees parts of Zenyak =
laying everywhere while Dracona laughs. The Radicons wave to Dracona and Pl=
intissa.

Sinesis and Sinister walk along until they reach the Maximal base=
, their plan going better than they expected. they had seen gunfire and kne=
w it could only mean that their trick worked. Sinister growled and punched =
himself in the head when he seen Plintissa safe and sound.

"Must have been=
 that dumb Dracona, we'll have to take care of her, too!" Sinesis said as S=
inister nodded.

Suukie sat in the CR Chamber of the People's Base as he wa=
tches the timer for the chamber tick down.

Gangon walks with BrightBlade a=
nd Lightmare. Lightmare could not belive that Gangon had chosen that bot th=
at looked like a pipe with hair over herself. Lightmare concocted a few plo=
ts that she was sure would obliterate BrightBlade, then Gangon would be all=
 for herself! Lightmare played it cool...for now...
